title: Pestle for iOS updated with new options for sharing recipes
content:
Pestle is a recipe and cooking app for iOS released earlier this year by indie developer Will Bishop – who’s also behind Chirp for Apple Watch. This week, Pestle was updated with new options that let users easily share recipes from the app.
